description: Stores details for primetime shift minutes. The values for each log in this table correspond to the values contributing to the numerator values in OpTime CSF (Cogito Summarized Facts) metrics.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORG_PRIMETIME_SHIFT_MINS
columns.description: The organization's primetime shift room utilization case in room minutes for a log.

columns.name: ORG_PRIMETIME_SHIFT_SET_MINS
columns.description: The organization's primetime shift room utilization setup minutes for a log.

columns.name: ORG_PRIMETIME_SHIFT_CLN_MINS
columns.description: The organization's primetime shift room utilization cleanup minutes for a log.
